channel.title: MonstersGame
channel.description:
It's a text based RPG I have recently found a slight enjoyment in.
If you enjoy text based RPGs then this is a good one. It follows the same basic layout as the rest. Clans, tamed animals (that you can attack with), link to give you money (http://world5.monstersgame.co.uk/?ac=vid&vid=59017373)
Check it out, and maybe create an account under my account ;)
Link: http://world5.monstersgame.co.uk/
And don't forget to click this: http://world5.monstersgame.co.uk/?ac=vid&vid=59017373 ;D
